description: This file declares external functions for accessing configuration parameters and instance numbers, used in the context of a data model agent within a TR-181-based system, likely for network device management.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueUlong
methods.description: Retrieves an unsigned long parameter value based on parameter name.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueString
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value based on parameter name into a provided buffer.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueBool
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value based on parameter name.

methods.name: CosaGetInstanceNumberByIndex
methods.description: Retrieves an instance number for a given object name and index.
